title: Patch 6.22 has made League UNPLAYABLE
body: I was excited for the new season but now I can't even play an ARAM. The patch has caused not only my games to lag, but it slows down my ENTIRE laptop. Before the patch League was running smooth. Now the ping spikes to 500+ and my frames drop to below 15 fps every few seconds. Absolutely unplayable. I reinstalled, updated my computer, scanned for malware, scanned for corrupted files, and waited 3 days to try playing again. it is still unplayable. Riot please fix this because I wanted to play during Thanksgiving break but it's looking like I won't be able to play at all :(

replies.body: Is your laptop plugged in while playing?  There could be a[ power management](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq11) issue; for example, I have similar issues when my laptop isn't plugged in.  Changing your setting to high performance  may resolve this!  Let me know!
Yes my laptop is plugged in while playing, but I haven't tried changing my performance settings. I'll try that. The client is slow without me being in game though so I don't think that will help.

I'm having this same issue. I play on a desktop, but all my games have been extremely laggy. Not showing ping spikes, but my character moves in slow motion and then jumps around. Its made it impossible for me to play.
